EmailTemplate.name: 4_1_2014_VMUG Seattle Follow up.Email_New
EmailTemplate.subject: Seattle VMUG: Thank You V-Much {{lead.first name:default=}}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank You, {{lead.first name:default=Turbofriend}}. We saw you in Seattle, and it was awesome.
Thanks for chatting with us at VMUG Seattle 2014. We wanted to send you some videos that show how VMTurbo has redefined the virtual ops landscape, improving the way that world-class organizations control and automate their virtual data centers.
